data.name: VINE
data.detailed_description:
New race Poro

A planet where humanity has disappeared. There, a new race, the 'Poro', took the place of mankind and settled as the new owner of the earth. You become a 'Poro' who has just finished hibernating, and you search for bugs to feed your hungry stomach.

Game using tongue

The main character can use his tongue to eat bugs, use his tongue to grab vines from the ceiling to move, and use his tongue to pull up boxes.

Dangerous Danger

Various traps in the lab make the protagonist's journey difficult, but the player must overcome them with his brain and wits.

It is a puzzle adventure game using the tongue, VINE.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Vine is a story that takes place inside the lung laboratory of Poro left behind on a planet where mankind has disappeared. A puzzle game in which you use a frog's tongue to solve puzzles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS (512 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
